name: Edgecore Networks
overview:
Edgecore Networks, Inc., formerly Business Solution Group of SMC Networks, Inc., is a global manufacturer of application-driven performance networking solutions designed to meet and exceed partner requirements and maximize return on investment. Edgecore has Accton Technology, one of the world’s largest OEM/ODM manufacturers, as it’s parent company. Leveraging 33 years of legacy as SMC Networks, Edgecore continues to be the champion of our partners and large install base of customers.

Edgecore is focused on solutions for SMB & enterprise LAN networks, Hospitality and other MxU environments, and Metro Ethernet technology for value conscious service providers. Edgecore Networks features a robust portfolio of networking solutions that includes managed SMB/E switches, Metro Access solutions and a variety of business-class WiFi solutions, all tied together through an advanced network management system. Leveraging SMC Networks’ 33-year legacy of channel loyalty, advanced technology, and dedicated partner support, Edgecore Networks provides its channel partners with a reseller program that is backed by a full complement of end-to-end networking solutions and is designed to maximize return-on-investment and increase profitability.
